languages.text: "Прекрати его страдания, если веришь, что оно — живое".
"If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."
languages.original_text: "Прекрати его страдания, если веришь, что оно — живое".

traits.locale_text: "If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."
"If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."
"If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."
"If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."
"If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."
"If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."

languages.text: 「こいつが生きていると思うなら、その苦しみを終わらせてやるといい」
languages.original_text: "If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."

traits.locale_text: 「こいつが生きていると思うなら、その苦しみを終わらせてやるといい」

languages.text: “如果你认为它有生命，那你应该结束它的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."

traits.locale_text: “如果你认为它有生命，那你应该结束它的痛苦。”

languages.text: «Si considera que esta cosa está viva, puede acabar con su sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: "If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."

traits.locale_text: «Si considera que esta cosa está viva, puede acabar con su sufrimiento».

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr glaubt, dass dieses Ding lebt, könnt Ihr sein Leid beenden."
languages.original_text: "If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr glaubt, dass dieses Ding lebt, könnt Ihr sein Leid beenden."

languages.text: « Si vous pensez que cette chose est encore en vie, je vous autorise à mettre un terme à ses souffrances. »
languages.original_text: "If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous pensez que cette chose est encore en vie, je vous autorise à mettre un terme à ses souffrances. »

languages.text: "Bu şeyin yaşıyor olduğunu düşünüyorsan, acısına bir son verebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "If you think this thing is alive, you may end its suffering."

traits.locale_text: "Bu şeyin yaşıyor olduğunu düşünüyorsan, acısına bir son verebilirsin."
